qas.question: How long were Schwarzenegger and Shriver married?
What newspaper broke the story about Schwarzenegger's child with another woman?

context: On May 9, 2011, Shriver and Schwarzenegger ended their relationship after <a0_0>25 years<a0_0/> of marriage, with Shriver moving out of the couple's Brentwood mansion. On May 16, 2011, <a1_0>the Los Angeles Times<a1_0/> revealed that Schwarzenegger had fathered a son more than fourteen years earlier with an employee in their household, Mildred Patricia 'Patty' Baena. "After leaving the governor's office I told my wife about this event, which occurred over a decade ago," Schwarzenegger said in a statement issued to The Times. In the statement, Schwarzenegger did not mention that he had confessed to his wife only after Shriver had confronted him with the information, which she had done after confirming with the housekeeper what she had suspected about the child.
